title: Matrix Inverse Calculator – Invert 2×2, 3×3, 4×4 and Larger Matrices

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Key facts Only square matrices (n×n) can be invertible. A matrix has an inverse if and only if det(A) ≠ 0. If A is invertible, then the inverse is unique. The inverse of the inverse is the original matrix: (A−1)−1 = A.
